body.name: Samsung UN78KS9500 Curved 78-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2016 Model)
features: The Ultimate Curved 4K SUHD Picture powered by the Quantum Dot Color Drive. Fires off a billion more colors than HD TVs for a lifelike picture unlike anything else
More than just pitch black, get the best shades of black with Triple Black Technology. Never miss a detail in the dark.
HDR 1000 mirrors the high contrast and vividness the way movie makers intended
Advanced contrast, color and sharpness for true-to-life image quality with Supreme UHD Dimming
Smart 2016 - Use one universal remote to switch from Live TV to streaming seamlessly. Easily access everything you want to watch.
body.description: Product Description The Samsung Curved 4K SUHD TV completely redefines the viewing experience with the revolutionary Quantum Dot nano-crystal technology. The KS9500 features innovations that produce a remarkable High Dynamic Range picture experience, regardless of room-light interference. Access your favorite streaming content services easier and faster with our premium design Smart Remote Controller. Amazon.com

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars World class performance by Samsung and Excellent Service Delivery by Amazon's Scheduled Delivery Service.
reviews.reviewText: This has to be the smartest most fantastic TV I have ever known. The remote took me about a day to become comfortable with, but so nice being able to control everything so smoothly. Bouncing from TV to 4k blu ray to Netflix or Amazon is literally lightning fast. I liken it to when I finally began using SSD in my laptop and upgraded ram to 32. Colors are vibrant, the picture modes are easy to switch between. It was even smart enough to know how to control my UVERSE cable box. Amazon did a great job of delivering on-time using enhanced scheduled delivery. My friends were very complimentary of both the design and performance of this device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Had this TV for 4 years. Works flawlessly. I saw other review that said picture was blotchy and squared off in places. That's because they didn't have the proper voltage going to it. It happened to me also so I took the receptacle out and could tell that the wires were not making good contact. Once I got the proper voltage and amperage allowed to go to the wires it's work flawlessly. Before I read about the voltage lost can cause that to happen half of my TV on the left side had gone out. And I know that's a characteristic of TVs going bad. But I'd only had this TV for a short amount of time and so I thought maybe something else was wrong other than it just wearing out. And so now a year later after I fix my receptacle it works perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beware of the OneConnect Mini
reviews.reviewText: While the TV is nice, the OneConnect mini is HORRIBLE.I want to be able to have audio out simultaneously to both a Bose home theater AND wireless headset. For those of you with elderly parents, i should not need to explain my reasons "why".But on the UN65KS9500 with the OneConnect Mini, there is absolutely no way to do this... not via analog audio (no jack either on the TV or the OneConnect)... not via bluetooth because they can only power one or the other (home theater via optical out OR Bluetooth, but NOT BOTH)... so it is Bluetooth and TV speakers OR Bose Home Theater.for a $3000 TV, this is just absurd!I have talked with Samsung and their online support if awful... not very technical and english is definitely not their first (or second) language. They have no solution. I have headsets on all our TVs, but this one.Awful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We are very happy with this SUHD TV 55inch colors are wonderful
reviews.reviewText: We only bought this curved TV because it had a center stand and it was cheaper than a straight one. We are very happy with this SUHD TV 55inch colors are wonderful, the remote is a pain to use I'm sure after a time of use it will make more sense but after two weeks it's still a problem for me, I looked at the new 2017 models but I felt that the 2016 were a good buy and Amazon still had some left . Only problem we have is our room has a lot of windows so we get reflections on the screen so we have to draw the curtains other than that it's fabulous

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great picture and decent sound from TV speakers
reviews.reviewText: Great picture and decent sound from TV speakers. Smart TV features are pretty limited to only apps allowed by Samsung and there are not many of any real interest to me. OS is locked down so you can' t install whatever you want unless you flash unapproved firmware and risk turning your great TV into a $4500 curved brick.All things considered I'm satisfied with this as a great TV.The so called open source TIZEN OS is a flop though because it is locked up to the user..Keeping my fingers crossed that a SAMYGO rev will come up that works on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Came in defective
reviews.reviewText: TV quality is good but the response to remote command is so slow, perhaps ours is defective. Also the remote is very difficult to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars TV is nice but I didn't like the remote
reviews.reviewText: TV is nice but I didn't like the remote . I have Samsung 78 9000 series which has pointer remote

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SAMSUNGS BEST 4K TELEVISION
reviews.reviewText: This television is by far the most impressive tv that I have watched in a long time. When you think it can't get any better throw in a 4k blu ray. Of course you will have to spring for the upgrade in the 4k blu ray player I did. In my opinion Samsungs has the best one out there for the money. Set up is easy. Wireless connection was a breeze !!! This television is absolutely amazing when you think it can't get any better then bam something else happens in a movie that blows your mind. You say damn I would of never saw that before !!! In my opinion I would recommend this television to anyone who wants quality you get what you pay for !!! Same goes for the 4k blu ray player.
Nunca lo enviaron el producto es solo una estafa lo estuve esperando y al final tuve que solicitar una devolución

reviews.reviewTitle: We received the TV well ahead of schedule right to are door and the young man helped me bring it in to the living room with a gr
reviews.reviewText: My wife was worried about getting are TV delivered, but I told her that the price was right and that I bought a 4 year warranty so if anything happened we could send it back. We received the TV well ahead of schedule right to are door and the young man helped me bring it in to the living room with a great sence of humour. That's why a gave it a "5 STAR".
Amaze tv , for some reason I could not figure out , it did not work (sound) with the new 4K digital box from Rogers
Absolutely fantastic! Set up was easiest ever. Picture is stunning.
